assetProfile.address2: No 1073 King Fahad Rd P.O. Box 331
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Bawan Company manufactures and sells metal and steel works. The company's Metal and Wood segment produces wooden pallets, plywood panels and boards, medium Wood and high density coated in decoration paper, platforms, wooden bowls and boxes, premade hangars and steel buildings, and forming and bending rebars; provides general contracting services, such as repair, demolition, rebuilding, and construction of residential, commercial and public buildings, educational recreational, and health facilities; offers maintenance, operation, and installation of equipment, devices, and electrical and electronic systems; provides iron and wood doors and their installation, carpentry, painting, and drawing on iron and wood; and undertakes aluminum, electrical extension, roads, and bridges and street works. Its Plastic segment manufactures plates and polystyrene foam, packaging and insulation slices from polyethylene foam, soft colored polyvinyl chloride sheets, rigid colored and non-colored polyvinyl chloride sheets, soft and hard polyvinyl chloride sheets padded by polystyrene, and parts for vacuum fans, transparent containers of PET polyethylene, polyethylene bottles, and PET preforms and their covers. The company's Electrical segment is involved in the wholesale and retail of electric transformers, voltage stabilizers, battery chargers, welding caustics, electric substations, electric station equipment, and voltage transformers; trading and distribution, import and export, testing and inspection services; and goods and commodities clearance and double-weight services. Its Concrete segment produces concrete products; provides repair and maintenance of laboratory tools and equipment, machines, industrial, electrical and non-electrical equipment, and desalination and sewage plants; and undertakes electrical and mechanical works. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
